summary: This module implements a transformation class that encapsulates Substrait query plans for Feast feature data. It handles conversion between Substrait protobuf representations and Feast's highâ€‘level abstractions, infers schemas, provisions tables, and executes the transformations using Arrow or Ibis backends.
business_intent: Enable Feast users to define and run complex data processing logic via Substrait, leveraging efficient Arrow/Ibis execution and seamless type mapping between Feast, pandas, and pyarrow, thereby extending the feature engineering capabilities of the Feast SDK.
